ai-patthana21.18:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.18:1.1_0: No cause is a reason for the result of deeds.
ai-patthana21.18:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of deeds that gives rise to cause and reason.
ai-patthana21.18:3.1_0: Nor does she neither cause nor reason to cause the result of deeds.
